entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Blowing snow at times in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023
